network
Interface Control

public interface Control

Interface Control This class allows for control and polling of the networking threads.

Author:
Antti Knutas

Method Detail

connect

int connect(java.lang.String address)
A command for the network interface to connect to a server address. Return value is 0 for failure, or a number for connection identifier.

Parameters:
address - Connection IP
Returns:
int

A command to disconnect a certain client or server connection.

int
